name: The Sun Flower (jannycorp)
description:
A ~5 minute game about a boy watering a wilting flower he discovers in his parents' flowerbed.

Gather water by jumping on the local wildlife and use it to grow your flower!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement (hold S to fall through platforms)
  • Space - Jump
  • Shift - Water (if you have water)
  • P - Pause
